messages.subject: Check this cool site out
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know how long it takes to load with dial-up, but i d think it s well worth the time.  The creation stories are beautifully illustrated and narrated.
messages.messageBody:
I don't know how long it takes to load with dial-up, but i'd think
it's well worth the time. The creation stories are beautifully
illustrated and narrated. My almost 4-year old son loved looking and
listening to the stories. While I did get this link from an atheist
list and it does include the old testament creation story among the
myths, it delivers the story with out mocking it.


>COMPARATIVE RELIGION, SOCIOLOGY, MYTHOLOGY
>The Big Myth
><A TARGET="Linked Document" HREF="http://www.bigmyth.com/>">
http://www.bigmyth.com/></A>
>Its a Flash site --- so if you have a slow connection/etc... it is
worth
>the wait.
